author: Kimberly Dozier
title: ‘It’s now that we can make a difference.’ Ten Questions for ICRC’s Peter Maurer
description: As the western world battles deadly waves of coronavirus, the first cases have been reported in Syria where hundreds of thousands of refugees are crammed into makeshift camps and bombed-out houses near the Turkish border. Neighboring Iraq is nearing a thousan…
